column2: I tried the Miso crusted bone marrow. It was a little salty
column3: but interesting in texture. Also had the foie gras duck chawanmushi
column4: but I honestly only enjoyed the foie gras part...(and even had better foie gras than this before). The kobe
column6: is wonderful. The tropical spicy tuna roll is very nice as the mango adds a nice tanginess to it.
